name: "Me, I am you" a chapter of Faranak

metadata.name: "Wingless dance"
metadata.description:
When all falls down 
I stand up
featherless
Breathless
Voiceless...
I get up and dance Wingless in the sky
I know you see me
look carefully
When everything is falling apart
I stand up and make the earth dance for you, for me, for us... 

Hamideh
2023_ Martinique
